src:
Northug abdiserte, men han er fortsatt lønnskongen
05 Nov 2019, 11:01 by Christian Skare Stendal
Petter Northug hadde et sportslig svakt 2018. Det viste seg på inntektene.
5,5 millioner inn i 2017 ble til 2,5 millioner kroner inn i 2018.
text:
Northug abdicated, but he is still the pay king
05 Nov 2019, 11:01 by Christian Skare Stendal
Petter Northug had a sporting decline in 2018. This was reflected in the earnings.
5.5 million in 2017 turned into 2.5 million in 2018.
